name: @jupyter-book/myst-plugin-substitutions
description: MyST plugin for simple text substitutions using Nunjucks

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.mjs --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.mjs --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
